item.title: Thoughts
item.description: This is my thought page. There are time where I just want sit down and be able to write my thoughts to share with no structure.

item.title: Shared Simple Account
item.description: The CFO of the House Outline Transparency Setting goals together Struggling together How much do we have for this month

item.title: 2017 Portland Marathon
item.description: Preparing for the Portland Marathon started about 6 months before. I was running before the registration, but on June 7th, 2017, I made a decision to run in the marathon. I have never ran a marathon before, and never even dreamed about running it. But after running with a close friend on a frequent basis, I got exposed to a technique that helped me through the training and the marathon itself.

item.title: Simple Banking
item.description: I’m not sure about a lot of people, but I was constantly surprise by my credit card statement each month as I pay off my credit card. It is also no surprise that my savings, were really saving. When I have some extra money left over from my monthly spending, I throw in a dollar here and there just to have a saving. This was not working out. The Envelope System - Digitized Goals are set up just like evelope Set a goal and the time you want to reach it Goals: Mortage for the month Food budget Fuel budget Groceries Eating out Pet budget Emergency funds Hobby/project funds Pick a budget, set a time and fund it!
